WRITING.TEXT: Because I have nothing better to do.
That little bow tie is adorable.

WRITING.TITLE: This is the most descriptive photo of my cats personality.

WRITING.TEXT:
Eugene Terre'Blanche, he wasn't a murderer but he was an all round shitty person and people were pretty elated when he died. He was a white-supremacist and Afrikaaner nationalist in South Africa. He was also the founder of the on going Afrikaner Weerstandsbeweging (Afrikaner Resistence Movement) which is a group of Afrikaans neo-nazi. In 2010 he was beaten to death by 2 of his farm workers in his sleep.
Here's a link to the article: https://www.theguardian.com/world/2010/apr/04/eugene-terreblanche-south-african-white-supremacist
And one to his Wikipedia: https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eug%C3%A8ne_Terre%27Blanche
Drowning or being slowly crushed to death. Just thinking about it makes me feel dizzy.
